remarks: The restriction of the set of upper sets of integers to an upper set of integers is the set of upper sets of integers based at a point above the cutoff.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
uzfbas.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
uzrest $p |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( ran ZZ>= |`t Z ) = ( ZZ>= " Z ) ) $.
